frontmatter.title: My Triangle of Success - Everything Should Be Text

node.excerpt: When working on my side projects with LLMs, I noticed a simple pattern that dramatically improved my results. I call it the triangle of success: Me (or any human can go here actually), LLM and text…

I know — professional software engineers look at this title with contempt. It has been proven multiple times already that the quality and overall value of vibe-coded solutions is at least questionable…
